What?

Bring along your raspberry Pi and some ideas for hacking. This will be a hosted session (by Matt Venn), but there will be no instruction.

  • Share knowledge and ideas
  • Build a break out board
  • Make your Pi talk to an Arduino

Where? At the hackspace: BS3 4EA

When? 7pm onwards on 11/12/12

Why? Share and learn about Raspberry Pi

Cost? Free for members, Â£2 for non members.
